title: The Best "Love Island USA" Swimsuits Still Worth Shopping, Starting at $16
description: Season seven of "Love Island USA" was equal parts entertaining, controversial, and anxiety-inducing. From the unforgettable spiral of Huda Mustafa and Jeremiah Brown (that lasted all of one week early on in the season), to the unexpected, yet necessary reunion of Olandria Carthen and Nic Vansteenberghe. Through the season's many cringe moments and last night's monumental win for sensitive gangster Amaya Espinal and Bryan Arenales, there were many noteworthy elements that inspired our shopping habits, including the outfits. From the minidresses and crochet button-downs that informed fire pit chats to Ariana Madix's mastery at cutouts, cast members made dressing in Fiji look too easy. And of course, the swimwear was far from lacking. Notable moments include Carthen's affinity for crochet coverups and cowboy hats (a combination that's so "Cowboy Carter"-coded), Mustafa's massive thongkini collection, and Megan Thee Stallion's "Hot Girl Summer" gold bikini, also marking its debut on the show. Whether islanders were strutting casually through the villa enjoying downtime with their partners or going on impromptu dates to another part of the island, each bikini look left us obsessed. Ahead, check out the best "Love Island USA" swimsuits from season seven - and shop exact and similar pieces to inspire your next vacation's wardrobe.
author: Naomi Parris

Season seven of "Love Island USA" was equal parts entertaining, controversial, and anxiety-inducing. From the unforgettable spiral of Huda Mustafa and Jeremiah Brown (that lasted all of one week early on in the season), to the unexpected, yet necessary reunion of Olandria Carthen and Nic Vansteenberghe. Through the season's many cringe moments and last night's monumental win for sensitive gangster Amaya Espinal and Bryan Arenales, there were many noteworthy elements that inspired our shopping habits, including the outfits.

From the minidresses and crochet button-downs that informed fire pit chats to Ariana Madix's mastery at cutouts, cast members made dressing in Fiji look too easy. And of course, the swimwear was far from lacking. Notable moments include Carthen's affinity for crochet coverups and cowboy hats (a combination that's so "Cowboy Carter"-coded), Mustafa's massive thongkini collection, and Megan Thee Stallion's "Hot Girl Summer" gold bikini, also marking its debut on the show. Whether islanders were strutting casually through the villa enjoying downtime with their partners or going on impromptu dates to another part of the island, each bikini look left us obsessed.

Ahead, check out the best "Love Island USA" swimsuits from season seven — and shop exact and similar pieces to inspire your next vacation's wardrobe.

Hannah Fields's Purple One-Piece on "Love Island USA" Season 7, Episode 15

Then-bombshell Hannah Fields also wore a piece from the rapper's swim line; this purple one-piece embellished with "Hot Girl summer." It's also sold out, but we found another swimsuit that's sure to be Hannah-approved.

Get The Look: Limeeke One Piece Swimsuit ($35).

Amaya Espinal's Brasil Bikini on "Love Island USA" Season 7, Episode 14

Just days after being coupled with Ace Greene, Espinal wore a yellow-and-green bikini adorned with the Brazil flag from Miçanga Swimwear.

Get The Look: Miçanga Swimwear Brasileira Amarela Set ($82).
